# Smart Writer: AI Writer

50K+

 _play_arrow_ Trailer

## About this app

 _arrow_forward_

Smart Writer Ai can help you be more productive and write smarter. Whether
crafting the perfect tweet or writing an email or blog post, Smart Writer can
assist you in every aspect of content creation. Powered by artificial
intelligence, Smart Writer provides support with spelling, grammar, and word
choice, offering valuable insights into your writing assignments' structure
and phrasing. Additionally, it helps create intelligent social media posts,
attention-grabbing headlines, and convincing arguments.  
  
Discover the amazing Smart Chat+ feature in Smart Writer AI, an incredible
chatbot that's as good as or even better than ChatGPT Plus! Smart Chat+ is
designed to make chatting a breeze, giving you lifelike conversations,
understanding context, and offering natural, flowing responses. You can ask
anything from trivia and general knowledge questions to advice on various
topics. Get ready to level up your communication game with Smart Chat+ and
enjoy exciting new possibilities in your professional and personal life!  
  
The fastest, easiest way to craft top-quality content. Smart Writer will write
for you! It can help you write a eulogy, write an article, write a book
report, compose a sales pitch, or compose a text message.  
Benefits:  
\- Craft social media posts 10X faster.  
\- Write blogs, articles, emails, ad copies etc., within minutes.  
\- Produce content that is more engaging and on-brand.  
\- Get help with ideas, structure, and tone.  
\- Communicate your ideas more effectively than ever before.  
\- Impress your audience with high-quality writing.  
\- Strengthen your writing confidence with expert-level guidance.  
\- Customize the writing tone to suit various platforms and audiences.  
\- Multi-language support to help you write in various languages.  
\- Stay focused on your ideas while the app handles grammar and punctuation.  
\- Optimize content for search engines (SEO) to increase visibility and
traffic.  
  
Whether you're working on an essay, a novel, or even a social media post,
Smart Writer AI has the tools you need to succeed. Download it now and start
writing like a pro with the power of Artificial Intelligence!

Updated on

Sep 27, 2023

Productivity

## Data safety

 _arrow_forward_

Safety starts with understanding how developers collect and share your data.
Data privacy and security practices may vary based on your use, region, and
age. The developer provided this information and may update it over time.

This app may share these data types with third parties

Personal info

No data collected

Learn more about how developers declare collection

Data isn’t encrypted

You can request that data be deleted

## What's new

New Features:  
\- Email assistant & Sales Copy feature added. Custom response to any email
within seconds!  
\- Code support added.  
\- Create an entire blog within minutes.  
\- Generate reviews for google etc. feature added  
\- Quora Answer assistant added.  
\- ChatGPT added.  
\- Convert passive to active voice right from the app.  
\- Cover Letter & Digital Ad tools added!  
\- Create Ad Copies, Sales Copies, Google Ad Headlines & Descriptions,
Facebook Ad Headlines.
